ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and disgorges what is inside it and empties out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And throws out whatever it contains and is empty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and casts out what is within it and is emptied,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and throws out of itself all that it contains
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And it unburdens itself of all that is in it, and becomes empty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And has cast out all that was in it and became empty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And casts forth what is in it and becomes empty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and casts forth what is in it, and voids itself,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And hath cast out all that was in her, and is empty
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and casts out all that is within it and becomes empty;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And shall cast forth that which is therein, and shall become empty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and throws out what is in it, emptying itself,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And casts forth what is within it and becomes (clean) empty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And has cast out all that was in it and became empty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and casts out all that is within and voids itself,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And casts out what is in it, and becomes empty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:4] and casts out all that is in it, of the dead, onto its surface, and empties itself, thereof,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And hath cast out all that was in her) of corpses and treasures, (and is empty) from all of that
